parameters.name: ProductCode
parameters.description:
The abbreviation of the Alibaba Cloud service name.

>  To query the abbreviation of an Alibaba Cloud service name, call the [ListProducts](~~440555~~) operation and check the value of `ProductCode` in the response.

parameters.name: QuotaActionCode
parameters.description:
The quota ID.

>  To query a quota ID of an Alibaba Cloud service, call the [ListProductQuotas](~~440554~~) operation and check the value of `QuotaActionCode` in the response.
